• I can reach speeds up to
    25 mph on land
    and 6 mph on water.
  • I am the largest
    carnivore (meat-eater)
    that lives on land.
  • I use floating sea ice
    as a platform to hunt seals.
  • Seals make up most of
    my diet. Yum!
  • Male Polar Bears like me
    can weigh up to 1500 pounds.
  • I spend most of my time in the water.
  • There are only around
    2000 Polar Bears in the world.
  • I have 42 teeth.
  • My scientific name is
    'ursus maritimus'.
  • I have an excellent sense of smell.
